original_text: They wanted the chance to help God's people. That would make them happy. So they asked us many times to help them to do this.
korean_text: 이 은혜와 성도 섬기는 일에 참여함에 대하여 우리에게 간절히 구하니

sentences.original_text: So they asked us many times
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 여러 번 우리에게 요청했습니다

sentences.original_text: to help them to do this
